name: Front Row Education, Inc.
description: Provider of a mathematics education program designed to meet the needs of every student through individualized Math, ELA and Social Studies resources. The company's mathematics education platform brings together the best in technology and great teaching to create unique, modern didactic experiences and makes a mathematics tablet program that adapts to students' capabilities in real time, enabling students to practice common core aligned math at their own pace and their teachers can tailor instruction for each student.
one_liner: Provider of a mathematics education program designed to meet the needs of every student through individualized Math, ELA and Social Studies resources. The company's mathematics education platform brings together the best in technology and great teaching to create unique, modern didactic experiences and makes a mathematics tablet program that adapts to students' capabilities in real time, enabling students to practice common core aligned math at their own pace and their teachers can tailor instruction for each student.
